root.message: The DATA_VALIDATION field for indicator 15-1-1, translated into en
root.data: All data submitted by countries to FRA, including the FAO estimates made in case of desk studies, are available at the FRA on-line platform (https://fra-data.fao.org/). The platform also includes the calculated indicator for 15.1.1. A request for validation was sent to the Head of Forestry of each country before finalization and publishing of data.
